tool_description: With Nexweave, you can create personalized images, GIFs, and interactive videos that make your audience feel special while increasing their engagement.
name: Nexweave
title: Nexweave

api_list.name: GetCampaignDetails
api_list.description: This API will return the Campaign details including variables used in the overall Campaign.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nexweave2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/integration/campaign/campaignId"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nexweave2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nexweave2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/integration/campaign/{campaignid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nexweave2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetAllTemplates
api_list.description: This API will return all the templates associated with the user's account, including Images & Video.

api_list.name: GetTemplateDetails
api_list.description: This API will return the template details including variables for a valid template.

api_list.name: GetAllCampaigns
api_list.description:
The API will return all the CSV Campaigns associated with the user's account, including Images, Videos &  Image+Video Campaign.

Note: The campaigns must be in Success state.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nexweave2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/integration/campaign"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nexweave2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
